page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: {Child} I get up about 7.30-8.00 and get washed and dressed then wait for my coach. When I get to school I do my first lesson. At 10.30 we have a break then we have six other lessons. Then we go home. When I get home I have my tea which is a hot meal. I watch television then go to bed. SARAH HALEY {Adult} I get up about 7:30 to 8:00. I have breakfast and then wash up. I then feed the guinea pigs and hamster. I then get dressed and do the housework. I do not work in an office but do voluntary work. I do lunch clubs for the elderly people in other villages. I go to bed at about 10:30 pm. TINA HOLLIDAY
